task.title: Scrambled Eggs with Smoked Salmon
task.shortdesc: Here's a great breakfast option with smoked salmon to top it off.

ul.li: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
12 to 15 blades of fresh chives, finely chopped

step.cmd: Reserve 2 slices of salmon for garnish and chop the remaining salmon into very small pieces
Whisk your eggs and cream together
